remarks:
Extract the second member of an ordered pair.  (See ~ op1sta to extract the first member, ~ op2ndb for an alternate version, and ~ op2nd for the preferred version.)  (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

statement:
cnvsn.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
cnvsn.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
op2nda $p |- U. ran { <. A , B >. } = B $.
